characterDescription: Spyros is 14 years old and he attends a private school in an urban area in Western Greece. He has a lot of friends and loves art. During the last months he has been in an intimate relationship with an older girl, Sasa.
storyDescription: Sasa is very beautiful, but often becomes very offensive. She insists that he should become more “manly” in his behaviour and that often she feels embarrassed when they go out together. Spyros is in love with Sasa, but he does not know whether he should speak out. He does not want to lose her so let’s see what happens when he decides to have a serious discussion with her!
